website_summaries.verdict: With a memory bump, the Apple iMac 27-inch (Nvidia GeForce GTX 675M) shows that it is still capable of running with the big dogs. It's the highest performance Mac we've seen, for now.
pros: Top-of-the-line processor and graphics card offer best-in-class performance
cons: No HDMI-in or out without an adapter
Needs external Thunderbolt drive for more storage

customer_reviews.title: iMAC27
customer_reviews.text: Having difficulty in accessing e-mail I went to Apple helpline and discovered in the conversation that this product is note as being sold last year in June I believe. This was a shock as it was not described as used in the sales description, merely that the packaging was damaged. To say that I am disgruntled is putting it mildly as I find that the 90 day support has been used up and should I require help I will have to pay £160 odd pounds for help. This is really disgraceful.
customer_reviews.author: BillyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Marvellous
customer_reviews.text: I have always had a PC up to now but was persuaded to try one of these. Takes a bit of time getting used to the way it works as it does work differently to a PC. It is impressive though.
customer_reviews.author: Swayze

customer_reviews.title: Magic IMAC
customer_reviews.text: well there a lot of pc out there but when it Come to the Apple IMac then it doesn't get better then this of course the only let down for me is the price its expensive but if you can afford it buy this lovely IMAC.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Orr.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: After over twenty years using PCs, i switched to Apple and I amanita looking back! Excellent computer!
customer_reviews.author: pqlrx

customer_reviews.title: excellent machine
customer_reviews.text: replacement for a former model which was also very good. Not sure if the new one is so much better that it warrants the cost involved however!
customer_reviews.author: John Dingley

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it, and was much cheaper that purchasing it from apple store.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: The Apple of my eye
customer_reviews.text: A great computer which is much faster and less cumbersome after my years of Windows with control/alt/delete etc and also has the advantage of style and quality build.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: excellent computer
customer_reviews.text: welcome replacement for an old PC - computer of choice particularly for graphics. large high resolution screen and very fast.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Apple 27 inch iMac
customer_reviews.text: Excellent computer. Much different to my last Microsoft computer and more reliable. Once I got the hang of things it was much easier to use. The screen is superb and makes a fantastic job of my photographs. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. P. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Just MAGIC!
customer_reviews.text: Have wanted this Computer for long enough & now I have one! So eye-catching it's 'The Bees-knees' Happy 'bod' Me!
customer_reviews.author: Spider

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing computer, the graphics are unbelievable and everything is accessed superfast. I would recommend this too anyone who is interested in creating films, powerpoints and wants a great gaming experience.
customer_reviews.author: MARY SLAON

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a fab computer!
customer_reviews.text: Whether you are into photography or not, this computer is simply the best, it'll show your pictures off a treat, even if they are not perfect. I would recommend this Apple computer to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: iMac
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly straight out of the box, no instructions included and none needed. Everything is of extremely high quality. It is expensive, but worth it
customer_reviews.author: Ged

customer_reviews.title: Great Mac
customer_reviews.text: I love my new iMac. I have been promising myself one of these since they came out and kept putting it off. The additional speed and real estate that it provides have made a difference to my productivity so it will probably pay fr itself over the next year. My old iMac is now at home being used by my son and still has several years of use to look forward to.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. D. Cryer
